definitions.definition: An international auxiliary language designed by L. L. Zamenhof .
Anything that is used as a single international medium in place of plural distinct national media .
examples: The U.S. dollar is the Esperanto of currency.

main_definition: An international auxiliary language designed by L. L. Zamenhof .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Anything that is used as a single international medium in place of plural distinct national media .
